citations.narrative:
Records received from U.S. Customs And Border Protection in Brownsville TN stated that Mr. Meyers, acting as
transporter for an Illinois based rescue group, did not present a USDA Live Dog Import permit upon arrival at the port with
twenty four dogs on 1/11/2024. The dogs were to be imported into the United States from Belize and Honduras without
the required documents including a Live Dog Import permit from USDA Animal Care. The dogs were ultimately released
by CBP into the United States.
Appropriate documents, including a Live Dog Import permit and any applicable certifications, are required to import dogs
into the United States to ensure that they are healthy and free of infectious diseases and parasites. Upon arrival of a dog
at the port of first arrival in the States, the person intending to import the dog, or his or her agent, must present the import
permit and any applicable certifications. Correct by 2/14/24.
This records inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant.
n

narrative:
2.152 
   
Notification of arrival. 
Records received from U.S. Customs And Border Protection in Brownsville TN stated that Mr. Meyers, acting as 
transporter for an Illinois based rescue group, did not present a USDA Live Dog Import permit upon arrival at the port with 
twenty four dogs on 1/11/2024. The dogs were to be imported into the United States from Belize and Honduras without 
the required documents including a Live Dog Import permit from USDA Animal Care. The dogs were ultimately released 
by CBP into the United States.  
Appropriate documents, including a Live Dog Import permit and any applicable certifications, are required to import dogs 
into the United States to ensure that they are healthy and free of infectious diseases and parasites. Upon arrival of a dog 
at the port of first arrival in the States, the person intending to import the dog, or his or her agent, must present the import 
permit and any applicable certifications. Correct by 2/14/24. 
 
This records inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant.
